Package group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.services

Interface Summary
IFileProvider Interface for IFile providers.
 

Class Summary
FileProviderService Base service for a file provider.
LocalFileProvider This is simple local file provider - as its name means.
It handles file request on local device.
 

Enum Summary
IFileProvider.FilterMode The filter of IFile.
Includes:
- IFileProvider.FilterMode.FilesOnly
- IFileProvider.FilterMode.DirectoriesOnly
- IFileProvider.FilterMode.FilesAndDirectories
IFileProvider.SortOrder IFile sorting parameters.
Includes:
- IFileProvider.SortOrder.Ascending
- IFileProvider.SortOrder.Descending
IFileProvider.SortType IFile sorting parameters.
Includes:
- IFileProvider.SortType.SortByName
- IFileProvider.SortType.SortBySize
- IFileProvider.SortType.SortByDate
